oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Rise and Fall of the Confederate Government" by Jefferson Davis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Two volume first edition set of "Rise and Fall of the Confederate Government" by Jefferson Davis. Published in 1881 by D. Appleton and Company, New York. The books belonged to Pitser Miller of Bolivar, Tennessee. Mr. Miller was known as "The Merchant Prince of Hardeman County." He amassed a fortune which was lost during the Civil War. Miller is buried in Polk Cemetery in Bolivar.
